name.text: Sports Authority at Mile High Stadium Tour
name.html: Sports Authority at Mile High Stadium Tour

description.text:
Due to Sports Authority Field at Mile High Stadium's registration requirements, cut off for registration is Tuesday, October 3 or until all available tickets sell out.

Enjoy a tailgate party at the Sheraton Downtown Denver, including drinks and heavy appetizers, before heading to a 75-90-minute VIP tour of Sports Authority Field at Mile High Stadium. Don't miss this opportunity for a "behind the scenes" glimpse of the home of the Denver Broncos and one of the most state-of-the-art stadiums in the country. 

This exclusive tour includes stops at the:


Colorado Sports Hall of Fame Museum




Executive Suite 




United Club Level 




Visiting Team Locker Room 




Keg Room 




Thunder's Stall




End Zone 




Television Truck Production Area 




Press Center

InclusionsAccess to Tailgate Party including appetizers and drinksShuttle Service to Sports Authority Field at Mile High StadiumGuided tour of Sports Authority Field at Mile High Stadium
Maximum of 350 registrations allowed on tour. Cartegraph reserves the right to cancel this tour.
Refund Policy: Cancellations received after Friday, September 8, 2017 will forfeit 100% of their registration fee.
